assignments.description: Adds the related case IDs to a collection.
assignments.name: AssignCasesToACollection
assignments.label: Assign Cases to Collection

assignments.description: Adds the current case to the RelatedCases record collection.
assignments.name: AssignCasesToCollection
assignments.label: Assign Records to Collections

assignments.description: Adds the related Incident IDs to a collection.
assignments.name: AssignIncidentsToACollection
assignments.label: Assign Incidents to Collection

assignments.description: Adds the current incident to the RelatedIncidents record collection.
assignments.name: AssignIncidentsToCollection
assignments.label: Assign Records to Collections

assignments.description: Adds the related problem IDs to a collection.
assignments.name: AssignProblemsToACollection
assignments.label: Assign Problems to Collection

assignments.description: Adds the current problem to the RelatedProblems record collection.
assignments.name: AssignProblemsToCollection
assignments.label: Assign Records to Collections

assignments.description: Sets CaseUpdateError to false. When the ReviewResults screen is shown, the value in CaseUpdateError determines whether the related cases are shown as completed or failed.
assignments.name: ResetRelatedCaseError
assignments.label: Reset Related Case Error

assignments.description: Sets IncidentUpdateError to false. When the ReviewResults screen is shown, the value IncidentUpdateError determines whether the related incidents are shown as completed or failed.
assignments.name: ResetRelatedIncidentError
assignments.label: Reset Related Incident Error

assignments.description: Sets ProblemUpdateError to false. When the ReviewResults screen is shown, the value in ProblemUpdateError determines whether the related problems are shown as completed or failed.
assignments.name: ResetRelatedProblemError
assignments.label: Reset Related Problem Error

assignments.description: Sets ChangeRequestUpdateError to true. When the ReviewResults screen is shown, the value of ChangeRequestUpdateError determines whether the change request is shown as completed or failed.
assignments.name: SetChangeRequestError
assignments.label: Set Change Request Error

assignments.description: Sets the status of the Change Request from GetCurrentChangeRequestRecord record variable to Closed.
assignments.name: SetChangeRequestStatusToClosed
assignments.label: Set Change Request Status to Closed

assignments.description: Sets CaseUpdateError to true. When the ReviewResults screen is shown, the value in CaseUpdateError determines whether the related cases are shown as completed or failed.
assignments.name: SetRelatedCaseError
assignments.label: Set Related Case Error

assignments.description: Sets the status of the related case from GetCase record variable to Closed.
assignments.name: SetRelatedCaseStatusToClosed
assignments.label: Set Related Case Status to Closed

assignments.description: Sets IncidentUpdateError to true. When the ReviewResults screen is shown, the value IncidentUpdateError determines whether the related incidents are shown as completed or failed.
assignments.name: SetRelatedIncidentError
assignments.label: Set Related Incident Error

assignments.description: Sets the status of the related incident from GetIncident record variable to Closed.
assignments.name: SetRelatedIncidentStatusToClosed
assignments.label: Set Record Status to Closed

assignments.description: Sets ProblemUpdateError to true. When the ReviewResults screen is shown, the value in ProblemUpdateError determines whether the related problems are shown as completed or failed.
assignments.name: SetRelatedProblemError
assignments.label: Set Related Problem Error

assignments.description: Sets the status of the related problem from the GetProblem record variable to Closed.
assignments.name: SetRelatedProblemStatusToClosed
assignments.label: Set Related Problem Status to Closed

choices.description: The choice of whether to close cases related to change requests.
choices.name: RelatedCasesChoice

choices.description: The choice of whether to close incidents related to change requests.
choices.name: RelatedIncidentsChoice

choices.description: The choice of whether to close problems related to change requests.
choices.name: RelatedProblemsChoice

decisions.description: Determines whether an incident record retrieved in the GetIncident element exists.
decisions.name: CheckIncidentStatus
decisions.label: What's the Related Incident Status?

decisions.description: Determines whether any change request related issues with a type of case exist.
decisions.name: DoRelatedCasesExist
decisions.label: Related Cases Exist?

decisions.description: Determines whether any change request related issues with a type of incident exist.
decisions.name: DoRelatedIncidentsExist
decisions.label: Related Incidents Exist?

decisions.description: Determines whether any change request related issues with a type of problem exist.
decisions.name: DoRelatedProblemsExist
decisions.label: Related Problems Exist?

decisions.description: Determines whether a case record retrieved in the GetCase element exists.
decisions.name: IsRelatedCaseInCollection
decisions.label: What's the Related Case Status?

decisions.description: Determines whether a problem record retrieved in the GetProblem element exists.
decisions.name: IsRelatedProblemInCollection
decisions.label: What's the Related Problem Status?

decisions.description: Determines whether the user has selected to close cases related to the change request.
decisions.name: WereRelatedCasesSelected
decisions.label: Related Cases Selected?

decisions.description: Determines whether the user has selected to close incidents related to the change request.
decisions.name: WereRelatedIncidentsSelected
decisions.label: Related Incidents Selected?

decisions.description: Determines whether the user has selected to close problems related to the change request.
decisions.name: WereRelatedProblemsSelected
decisions.label: Related Problems Selected?

loops.description: Iterates over cases retrieved in the GetCases element.
loops.name: IterateOverRetrievedCases
loops.label: Iterate Over Retrieved Cases

loops.description: Iterates over incidents retrieved in the GetIncident element.
loops.name: IterateOverRetrievedIncidents
loops.label: Iterate over Retrieved Incidents

loops.description: Iterates over problems retrieved in the GetProblem element.
loops.name: IterateOverRetrievedProblems
loops.label: Iterate Over Retrieved Problems

loops.description: Repeats actions in loop for each change request related issue record with a type of case retrieved in the GetRelatedCases element.
loops.name: IterateRelatedCases
loops.label: Iterate Over Related Cases

loops.description: Repeats actions in loop for each change request related issue record with a type of incident retrieved in the GetRelatedIncident element.
loops.name: IterateRelatedIncidents
loops.label: Iterate Over Related Incidents

loops.description: Repeats actions in loop for each change request related issue record with a type of problem retrieved in the GetRelatedProblems element.
loops.name: IterateRelatedProblems
loops.label: Iterate Over Related Problems

recordLookups.description: Gets the cases in bulk with IDs that match the related issue ID of the current change request issue record. The result is stored in the Case from GetCases record variable.
recordLookups.name: GetCases
recordLookups.label: Get Cases

recordLookups.description: Gets the current change request record and stores it in the Change Request from GetCurrentChangeRequestRecord record variable.
recordLookups.name: GetCurrentChangeRequestRecord
recordLookups.label: Get Current Change Request Record

recordLookups.description: Gets the incidents in bulk with IDs that match the related issue ID of the current change request issue record. The result is stored in the Incident from GetIncidents record variable.
recordLookups.name: GetIncidents
recordLookups.label: Get Incidents

recordLookups.description: Gets the problems in bulk with IDs that match the related issue ID of the current change request issue record. The result is stored in the Problem from GetProblems record variable.
recordLookups.name: GetProblems
recordLookups.label: Get Problems

recordLookups.description: Gets change request related issues that have a type of case and stores them in the Change Request Related Issues from GetRelatedCases record collection.
recordLookups.name: GetRelatedCases
recordLookups.label: Get Change Request Issues

recordLookups.description: Gets change request related issues that have a type of incident and stores them in the Change Request Related Issues from GetRelatedIncidents record collection.
recordLookups.name: GetRelatedIncidents
recordLookups.label: Get Change Request Issues

recordLookups.description: Gets change request related issues that have a type of problem and stores them in the Change Request Related Issues from GetRelatedProblems record collection.
recordLookups.name: GetRelatedProblems
recordLookups.label: Get Change Request Issues

recordUpdates.description: Updates the current record in Change Request from GetCurrentChangeRequestRecord, changing the record status to Closed.
recordUpdates.name: UpdateChangeRequestRecord
recordUpdates.label: Update Change Request Record

recordUpdates.description: Updates all related case records in the RelatedCases collection.
recordUpdates.name: UpdateRelatedCases
recordUpdates.label: Update Records

recordUpdates.description: Updates all related incident records in the RelatedIncidents collection.
recordUpdates.name: UpdateRelatedIncidents
recordUpdates.label: Update Records

recordUpdates.description: Updates related problem records from GetProblem, changing the record statuses to Closed.
recordUpdates.name: UpdateRelatedProblems
recordUpdates.label: Update Records

screens.description: Allows users to review the results of the flow.
screens.name: ReviewResults
screens.label: Review Results

fields.name: TroubleshootFailure
fields.fieldText: To troubleshoot the issue, see Customer Service Incident Management flow considerations in Salesforce Help.

screens.description: Allows users to select one or more related issues to close when closing a change request.
screens.name: SelectCloseRelatedIssuesOptions
screens.label: Select Close-Related Issues Options

fields.name: DisplayTextScreenInstructions
fields.fieldText: Mark a Change Request and related Incidents, Problems, and Cases as Closed. Related issues may relate to more than one Change Request. Only directly-related issues are closed. Second-level related issues, like a Problem related to a Change Request's related Incident, must be manually closed.

textTemplates.description: The section header for the SelectCloseRelatedIssuesOptions screen.
textTemplates.name: SectionHeaderSelectOptions
textTemplates.text: Close a Change Request and Its Related Issues

textTemplates.description: The label for the checkbox group in the SelectCloseRelatedIssuesOptions screen.
textTemplates.name: TextCheckboxGroupLabel

variables.description: Stores case IDs for case records that match change request related issue records with a type of case that were retrieved in the GetRelatedCases element.
variables.name: CaseIdsCollection

variables.description: Stores the Boolean value that indicates whether the cases were updated. This value affects how details are shown on ReviewResults screen.
variables.name: CaseUpdateError

variables.description: Stores the Boolean value that indicates whether the change request was updated. This value affects how details are shown on ReviewResults screen.
variables.name: ChangeRequestUpdateError

variables.description: Stores incident IDs for incident records that match change request related issue records with a type of incident that were retrieved in the GetRelatedIncidents element.
variables.name: IncidentIdsCollection

variables.description: Stores the Boolean value that indicates whether the incidents were updated. This value affects how details are shown on ReviewResults screen.
variables.name: IncidentUpdateError

variables.description: Stores problem IDs for problem records that match change request related issue records with a type of problem that were retrieved in the GetRelatedProblems element.
variables.name: ProblemIdsCollection

variables.description: Stores the Boolean value that indicates whether the problems were updated. This value affects how details are shown on ReviewResults screen.
variables.name: ProblemUpdateError

variables.description: Stores cases to be bulk updated in the UpdateRelatedCases element.
variables.name: RelatedCases

variables.description: Stores incidents to be bulk updated in the UpdateRelatedIncidents element.
variables.name: RelatedIncidents

variables.description: Stores problems to be bulk updated in the UpdateRelatedProblems element.
variables.name: RelatedProblems
